definition: To perform an action quickly or with haste, often in order to avoid being late or to complete a task promptly. This word is commonly used when referring to individuals rushing or hurrying in a time-sensitive situation.

examples.german: Wir m√ºssen uns beeilen, sonst verpassen wir den Zug.
examples.english: We need to hurry, otherwise we'll miss the train.

examples.german: Kannst du dich bitte beeilen? Ich warte schon lange.
examples.english: Can you please hurry? I've been waiting for a long time.

examples.german: Beeil dich nicht so, du hast noch genug Zeit.
examples.english: Don't rush, you still have plenty of time.

examples.german: Er beeilte sich, um den Bus zu erwischen.
examples.english: He hurried to catch the bus.
